1.  If a tour is knight is finding a tour, click on Pause to pause the tour generation. A Save button will appear.
2.  Click on Save to save the incomplete tour. This will save the tour, duration, and total steps done by the knight.
3.  Click on Start to resume the tour generation.
4.  If there is no tour being generated, and you wish to load the incomplete tour, click on the Load button.
5.  The incomplete tour will be displayed and can be continued by clicking Resume.
